data.message:
Eminem; Marshall Mathers III

Please do more than one concert a year, even if it is only in Detroit, MI. I am a fan not for all the music you put out that is twisted, or messed up, but for the music you put out that has meaning. I listen to you for songs like Beautiful, Not Afraid, Lose Yourself, Like Toy Soldiers, and so on. 

Please come back to the music world, I miss the greatest rapper alive. 

People come to see you. If you make an appearance at a show for someone else, the show is no longer theirs it is yours. People love you and miss you. 

I'd even go to a concert I did not like anyone at, just because I knew you would make a 2/3 song appearance. 

Sincerely, 
    A Long Time Fan. 

#Eminem #MarshallMathersIII #ComeBackEminem #EminemLive #Please
